titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Spain
Spain

div.head: Legislation
div.p: A Ministerial Order of 2 April 1991, concerning the archives, dictates that material becomes available to the public after 25 years.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs General Archives: Plaza de la Provincia, 1, 28012-Madrid

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers must submit a written application for access to documents to the Director of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs General Archives.
